section.name: Pellet Reasoner
section.p: Pellet is an OWL 2 reasoner. For applications that need to represent and reason about information using OWL, Pellet is the leading choice for systems where sound-and-complete OWL DL reasoning is essential. Pellet includes support for OWL 2 profiles including OWL 2 EL. It incorporates optimizations for nominals, conjunctive query answering, and incremental reasoning.

subsection.name: Tutorials
subsection.p: This project is sponsored by Clark & Parsia , which provides commercial support. Fortunately there's also a community support and some examples can be retrieved over the network. Check the following links to start:
